appearances.dialogue:
Don't worry about losing your face - you were never that handsome anyway. It's a good thing you lived.
				I used to serve your father, Jack the Man, in the past. I want to help you.
People of Cardia Nostra will want different things of you. Decide carefully whether or not you want to give them what they want.
I have found some cards in the attic. Take them for free, Jackie - perhaps they will be of use.
You may have noticed some things are happening overnight. Perhaps you will be able to manipulate the market to your benefit...
Please accept my card as a tribute, sir. They say mafia is not for kids like me, but I have to join it to protect my mother and sister.
T-the dons demand that I pay them, and I have no means to do so. If you could give me a rare card, you'd save my life. And I'll pay you threefold when I climb up the ranks
Ahahahahahah! I scammed you! I'm the king of mafia now, and I won't give you shit!
Um... There's an injured Ricky Double-Fold's capo at the hospital. Give me a common card - and he'll never leave the place... God, it would be embarassing if I was talking to the wrong guy right now.

I heard it's thanks to you that mumbling fool is in his grave and doesn't pester my hospital room.
				Take these. My grandson is too old to play with them anyway.

Our cult lacks funding. Give me a common card and we will use our rituals to help you.
				After all, you are quite supernatural yourself now.

WOW! Have you seen our latest ritual, man?
				Now we want to summon fire demons to help you out! They will burn your enemies!
				Give us an uncommon card, please!

I told them it was a bad idea. But they never listen. 
				Our next plan is to summon the fire devil himself, and for that we'll need a rare card.
				I'm not sure it will work, though.

I've been betrayed just like you. The new 'Ace of Clubs' took my place and killed my friends.
				Give me a Super Rare card so that I can get my position back. I promise I'll return the favour.

I've killed all those who betrayed me. But I feel hollow.
				Nothing will return me my friends, nor the trust in my people. I've decided to give my cards to charity and retire. But this one is for you.
Hello. I'm sorry for what Ricky Doubleâ€‘Fold did to ya. Let's make an alliance: give me an uncommon card to protect my restaurant from Ricky, and my people will give you discounts on the market.

We've worked well last time, friend! I've found a way to weaken Ricky's position.
				Give me a rare card, and come see the market tomorrow.

Great news! My friends at the city hall offered me a nice position for a small 'gift'.
				Give me a Super Rare card and we'll make sure Ricky perishes.

It's thanks to you the Spades no longer harass me at the restaraunt...
				I don't have much, but take this card. And heed my advice: don't trust Silas. He's a snake.

Heard the shots' down the street. It's thanks to ya they got rid of Spades' hideout...
				But I'm curious, why do ya even help that Silas guy?

You're this don everyone's talking about. A famous mobster going around helping civilians.
				If you could give me a Super Special Card... I could even go further and make you the Mayor of the city.
